GOD.content: angel, postman, prophet, intermediary by which I hear God
GOD.linkedContent: angel, postman, prophet, intermediary by which I hear God

GT.content: secret of literature has no depth, no interiority, spread on the surface of the page, non-psychological structure, not subjective though responsible for most radical effects of subjectivity, a post card, a bank note, a “letter of credit”  [see LOBL p. ~101, & SUBJECTILE]
GT.linkedContent: secret of literature has no depth, no interiority, spread on the surface of the page, non-psychological structure, not subjective though responsible for most radical effects of subjectivity, a post card, a bank note, a “letter of credit” [see LOBL p. ~101, & SUBJECTILE]

OOG.content: Husserl’s Rückfrage (return inquiry, question en retour) has a postal reference, return inquiry asked on basis of a first posting, already readable document offering possibility to ask about final intention, which is mediacy itself, openness to a general telecommunication
OOG.linkedContent: Husserl’s Rückfrage (return inquiry, question en retour) has a postal reference, return inquiry asked on basis of a first posting, already readable document offering possibility to ask about final intention, which is mediacy itself, openness to a general telecommunication

OOG.content: return inquiry [tautology]: geometry’s development is a history only because it is a history > ground of unity is the world (not finite totality of sentient beings), but infinite totality of possible experiences in space
OOG.linkedContent: return inquiry [tautology]: geometry’s development is a history only because it is a history > ground of unity is the world (not finite totality of sentient beings), but infinite totality of possible experiences in space

AF.content: psychoanalysis formed in time of postal delay

VM.content: we are God arrived too early, forever late in relation to the already-there of Being
VM.linkedContent: we are God arrived too early, forever late in relation to the already-there of Being

ROP.content: pourquoi mon explication avec l’analyse [psychoanalysis] a toujours eu ce goût de mort en poste restante qui m’a poussé à rôder sans fin dans les parages de Beyond the Pleasure Principle [?]
ROP.linkedContent: pourquoi mon explication avec l’analyse [psychoanalysis] a toujours eu ce goût de mort en poste restante qui m’a poussé à rôder sans fin dans les parages de Beyond the Pleasure Principle [?]

ROP.content: Glas and The Post Card, books on bind (Band), nexum, desmos, stricture, “unsolvable-postal effect”
ROP.linkedContent: Glas and The Post Card, books on bind (Band), nexum, desmos, stricture, “unsolvable-postal effect”

PIO.content: to call all invention that of mark/trace (rather than language), btwn culture & nature: man/animal opposition [cf. Bergson on p. 418n] no longer accredited, privileges the postal, movement of envoi, differance
PIO.linkedContent: to call all invention that of mark/trace (rather than language), btwn culture & nature: man/animal opposition [cf. Bergson on p. 418n] no longer accredited, privileges the postal, movement of envoi, differance

ATAP.content: Nietzsche’s I have forgotten my umbrella at once totally open & hermetic, “as secret and superficial as the apocalypse of the postcard it announces and protects against”
ATAP.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s I have forgotten my umbrella at once totally open & hermetic, “as secret and superficial as the apocalypse of the postcard it announces and protects against”

ATAP.content: apocalypse as dream of raising (aufheben) veil of Isis
ATAP.linkedContent: apocalypse as dream of raising (aufheben) veil of Isis

ATAP.content: apocalypse on both sides of censorship: 1) nothing less conservative than apocalyptic genre, escapes all postal regulations (where censorship is strong, apocalyptic writings increase) 2) state censors by denouncing as false, mystagogic, obscure, apocalyptic
ATAP.linkedContent: apocalypse on both sides of censorship: 1) nothing less conservative than apocalyptic genre, escapes all postal regulations (where censorship is strong, apocalyptic writings increase) 2) state censors by denouncing as false, mystagogic, obscure, apocalyptic

ATAP.content: apocalypse a challenge to maintenance of order (la police) of destination, la police postale, to the monopoly of posts
ATAP.linkedContent: apocalypse a challenge to maintenance of order (la police) of destination, la police postale, to the monopoly of posts

PF.content: countersignature: confirmation of an agreement & a wholly other signature: counterforce [re: Peggy Kamuf’s collection, Derrida’s texts have returned to him transformed]
PF.linkedContent: countersignature: confirmation of an agreement & a wholly other signature: counterforce [re: Peggy Kamuf’s collection, Derrida’s texts have returned to him transformed]

TR.content: reader as judge, the addressee who decides on reception/address of post card, signature left to the responsibility of the other, reader signs at moment of arrival at destination, rather than at the origin, at moment of reading rather than of writing
TR.linkedContent: reader as judge, the addressee who decides on reception/address of post card, signature left to the responsibility of the other, reader signs at moment of arrival at destination, rather than at the origin, at moment of reading rather than of writing

TR.content: the 2 meanings of arriver: 1) event that happens to someone 2) message that arrives—or doesn’t arrive at destination, or at some unforeseeable addressee > this singular instability plays w/ its own automatism, never spontaneously interrupted [?] [privileged access to machine effect]
TR.linkedContent: the 2 meanings of arriver: 1) event that happens to someone 2) message that arrives—or doesn’t arrive at destination, or at some unforeseeable addressee > this singular instability plays w/ its own automatism, never spontaneously interrupted [?] [privileged access to machine effect]

SPEC.content: postal relay (relais) makes it possible for letter not to arrive, divides structure of letter from outset (d’entrée), neither relay nor analysis if letter were indivisible & always arrived
SPEC.linkedContent: postal relay (relais) makes it possible for letter not to arrive, divides structure of letter from outset (d’entrée), neither relay nor analysis if letter were indivisible & always arrived

SPEC.content: race to death, exhausts couriers, witnesses, relays, from post to post
SPEC.linkedContent: race to death, exhausts couriers, witnesses, relays, from post to post

SPEC.content: partial drive: assists in death, return closest to oneself as if to one’s origin, s’envoyer > in the pas de détour, organism guards against the other stealing death from it: to be the facteur of its death
SPEC.linkedContent: partial drive: assists in death, return closest to oneself as if to one’s origin, s’envoyer > in the pas de détour, organism guards against the other stealing death from it: to be the facteur of its death

SPEC.content: garde-fou has disappeared en chemin, all speculative transferences are of the party (partie); transference: as transpose, translate, network of correspondences, traffic, postal, railway, sorting
SPEC.linkedContent: garde-fou has disappeared en chemin, all speculative transferences are of the party (partie); transference: as transpose, translate, network of correspondences, traffic, postal, railway, sorting

SPEC.content: function of binding (not machinelike regularity [?]), function of stricture as original as the X about which we can only know once banded, once represented by representatives
SPEC.linkedContent: function of binding (not machinelike regularity [?]), function of stricture as original as the X about which we can only know once banded, once represented by representatives

SPEC.content: to bind is to supplement/substitute, thus represent, Ersatz in place of what stricture inhibits/forbids, to bind is also to detach, detaches a representative, sends it on a mission, a missive liberated to fulfill destiny of what it represents: a post effect, de facteur préposé à l’acheminement ——the secondary (supplementary stricture) transforms freely mobile into immobile cathectic energy: posits, posts—here’s a thesis: immobilized cathexis is more tonic, tonicity related to effects of binding (elasticity & tension), thus binden as bander (erection): “bander: poster, liason: postale”
SPEC.linkedContent: to bind is to supplement/substitute, thus represent, Ersatz in place of what stricture inhibits/forbids, to bind is also to detach, detaches a representative, sends it on a mission, a missive liberated to fulfill destiny of what it represents: a post effect, de facteur préposé à l’acheminement ——the secondary (supplementary stricture) transforms freely mobile into immobile cathectic energy: posits, posts—here’s a thesis: immobilized cathexis is more tonic, tonicity related to effects of binding (elasticity & tension), thus binden as bander (erection): “bander: poster, liason: postale”

SPEC.content: Bemächtigungstrieb, drive not reduced to other drives, takes place in others, quasi-transcendental privilege, donner, prendre, envoyer, destiner, transcendental tautology
SPEC.linkedContent: Bemächtigungstrieb, drive not reduced to other drives, takes place in others, quasi-transcendental privilege, donner, prendre, envoyer, destiner, transcendental tautology

SPEC.content: drive to dominate: drivenness of drive
SPEC.linkedContent: drive to dominate: drivenness of drive

SPEC.content: Laplanche & Pontalis compare Bemächtigung (power, possession, domination) to Bewältigung (violent exercise of power) > the “posts” are always posts of power (i.e. dynamics of sadism are dynamics of power)
SPEC.linkedContent: Laplanche & Pontalis compare Bemächtigung (power, possession, domination) to Bewältigung (violent exercise of power) > the “posts” are always posts of power (i.e. dynamics of sadism are dynamics of power)

SPEC.content: Freud asks how sadism can be deduced from Eros if it tends to destroy the object
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud asks how sadism can be deduced from Eros if it tends to destroy the object

SPEC.content: auto-heterology of drive for postal power, more originary than, independent of, PP > the only one to permit definition of death drive, an original sadism
SPEC.linkedContent: auto-heterology of drive for postal power, more originary than, independent of, PP > the only one to permit definition of death drive, an original sadism

SPEC.content: beyond the pleasure principle—power: that is, les postes [erection, position & delay]
SPEC.linkedContent: beyond the pleasure principle—power: that is, les postes [erection, position & delay]

SPEC.content: power (posts) as transcendental predicate (not to be confused w/ death drive or repetition compulsion, gives us w/ what to describe them) > still, though borrowing descriptive traits from Bemächtigung, death drive & repetition compulsion overflow power > there is only differance of power, whence the posts, “will to power” [?]
SPEC.linkedContent: power (posts) as transcendental predicate (not to be confused w/ death drive or repetition compulsion, gives us w/ what to describe them) > still, though borrowing descriptive traits from Bemächtigung, death drive & repetition compulsion overflow power > there is only differance of power, whence the posts, “will to power” [?]
